attributes.action: End the Government's Policy of blind subservience to American Foreign policy and to take positive steps to ensure the United Kingdom is represented on the world stage in its own right as opposed to a puppet of the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK's passive adherance to and support of US foreign policy has weakened the UK on the world stage and having once been respected as a fair though sometimes critical friend of most nations is now vilified as a puppet of the US and in particular GW Bush.  In view of the fact that US foreign policy is misguided to the point of illegality and insanity, I contend that the UK should no longer align itself blindly to the US but rather should develop original thought and action in respect of world events, including those in Iraq.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
